item.title: Mocha Chocolate Cake
item.description: This thing is the ultimate indulgence. A rich dark chocolate cake with a silky mocha swiss meringue buttercream. Prep Time 2 hours Cook Time 35 minutes Total Time 2 hours 35 minutes Servings 12 Calories 613 kcal I guess? INGREDIENTS Chocolate Cake: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar 3/4 cup Dutch-processed cocoa powder sifted 1 1/2 tsp baking soda 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 1/4 cup vegetable oil 3/4 cup buttermilk 3/4 cup strong brewed coffee hot 2 large eggs 2 tsp vanilla Mocha Buttercream:
